title: Steins;Gate 0: Kesshou Takei no Valentine - Bittersweet Intermedio
synopsis: With Valentine's Day just around the corner, the girls of the Future Gadget Lab discover that Kagari has never celebrated the occasion before! Determined to make this year's holiday the best one yet, they all set out to make delicious homemade chocolates together.
characters: ['Okabe, Rintarou', 'Makise, Kurisu', 'Shiina, Mayuri', 'Amane, Suzuha', 'Hashida, Itaru', 'Urushibara, Ruka', 'Hiyajou, Maho', 'Akiha, Rumiho', 'Kiryuu, Moeka', 'Tennouji, Yuugo']
voices: ['Miyano, Mamoru', 'Imai, Asami', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Tamura, Yukari', 'Seki, Tomokazu', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Yahagi, Sayuri', 'Momoi, Haruko', 'Gotou, Saori', 'Terasoma, Masaki']
